Miscellaneous Highlights: Bhutan won the toss and elected to field first against Maldives.
Bhutan lost their opening match against Thailand by a big margin of 77 runs.
Maldives defeated Indonesia by 23 runs in a rain-affected match.
Others: Bhutan are facing Maldives in match 3 of the Quadrangular T20I series in Bhutan on Sunday.
The hosts Bhutan are up against the Maldives in match 3 of the Quadrangular T20I series in Bhutan being held at Gelephu International Cricket Ground in Gelephu.
